// URL :: http://www.codechef.com/problems/RESIST

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

ll cal_fibmod(ll n, ll z, ll *r)
{
	ll a = 0, b = 1, tp;
	n = 2 * n - 1;
	while(n--)
	{
		tp = b;
		b = (a + b) % z;
		a = (tp) % z;
	}
	*r = (a % z);
	return (b % z);
}

int main()
{
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		ll x, y, n, z;
		cin >> n >> z;
		y = cal_fibmod(n, z, &x);
		cout << x << "/" << y << endl;
	}	
	return 0;
}
